mapper.select: select * from D_BOARD order by D_SEQ
mapper.update: update D_BOARD set d_cnt = d_cnt+1 where d_seq = #{num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM D_BOARD db WHERE D_SEQ = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_BOARD (d_seq, D_TITLE, D_CONTENT, USER_ID, D_CATEGORY) VALUES (D_BOARD_seq.nextval, #{d_title}, #{d_content}, #{user_id}, #{d_category})
mapper.select: SELECT dc.CMT_SEQ , dc.P_SEQ , dc.CMT_CONTENT , dc.CMT_DATE , du.USER_NICK , du.USER_ID FROM D_COMMENT dc JOIN D_USER du ON (dc.USER_ID = du.USER_ID) WHERE dc.P_SEQ = #{board_num} ORDER BY dc.CMT_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_COMMENT (CMT_SEQ, P_SEQ, CMT_CONTENT, USER_ID) VALUES (D_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{p_seq}, #{cmt_content}, #{user_id})
